paper_keywords: Structures and organisation in complex systems
paper_abstract: Complex networks are important instances of technology-related complex systems. In this work we apply tools from complexity science to characterise two Telefonica Espana transport network systems: the optical fiber network and the SDH transport network. We compare both cases and derive its most important properties. Remarkably, our results show that in both cases several features of heterogeneous, hierarchical complex networks arise. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Complexity in Spanish optical fiber and SDH transport networks
